DOC.brief_summary: Gemcitabine plus carboplatin in recurrent or metastatic breast cancer is a recommended scheme in National Comprehensive Cancer Network (NCCN) guideline. gemcitabine in combination with capecitabine is also effective in Metastatic Breast Cancer (MBC) in some clinical study with small sample.
DOC.brief_title: Trial of Gemcitabine_Capecitabine Versus Gemcitabine_Carboplatin in Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: A multicenter randomized phase â…¢ clinical trial of gemcitabine in combination with capecitabine versus gemcitabine plus carboplatin as first-line treatment in triple-negative recurrent or metastatic breast cancer.The primary endpoints of the study is progression free survival (PFS). The secondary endpoints are overall response rate (ORR), overall survival (OS) and safety.
